Hi all, 

It is an interesting idea to see what if the phenotypes produced =
by the 
CPPNs change over their lifetime. There are two approaches to this:=
 the 
CPPN can output hebbian learning parameters to the connections or the=
 
CPPN can be re-queried every time step, so the connections will be 
basic=
ally different every time, depending on the environment, which 
will be inp=
ut to the CPPN. 
Is there any ongoing research into this? 

Peter
